definition_en: A series of publications containing technical and administrative information, research results, and regulatory decisions issued by the NRC.
definition_ko: NRC에서 발행하는 기술 및 행정 정보, 연구 결과, 규제 결정 등을 포함하는 보고서 및 간행물 시리즈.

slots.context_ko: NRC publications in the NUREG series, NRC regulations, and Title 10, Energy,'f the Code of Federal Regulations, may be purchased from one of the following sources:
